duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform golf club repairs, including re-gripping, re-shafting, loft and lie adjustments.
Perform club fitting and club performance modifications through the use of club fitting equipment.
Manage workflow for all customer services and establish turn-around times to meet customer’s needs.
Promote Company programs including Warranty Sales, Scorecard, Private Label Credit Card, etc.
Accurately track shop usage and manage golf service supply inventory.
Provide a high level of customer service and consistently put the customer at the center of everything we do.
Uphold Company standards for merchandise presentation and maintain proper inventory levels to daily standards.
Maintain and participate in all recovery and cleanliness standards.
Create an inclusive in-store environment where everyone feels welcome, safe, and is treated with respect.
Support the team across the store and perform other tasks as assigned by management.
